item.title: AI Product Development Team Reading Party: [INSPIRED Product Management that Creates Enthusiastic Products]
item.description: In this post, I will introduce the management method and contents of the reading event held by the "AI Product Development Team" that I lead. The books targeted at this reading party are ** [INSPIRED Product management that creates enthusiastic products] ** https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0814STTHV/ is. In Japanese, it is translated as “Product Management that creates enthusiasm products,” but in English How to Create Tech Products Customers Love is. How to make a loved product.
